attributes.action: Honour one of our Greatest Sportsmen , .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As one of the worlds greatest boxers John Conteh , a home grown sportsman of a magnetude so rarely seen , took British , European , commonwealth  and world titles as a light heavy weight . Then defended the title on several occasions.
 Yes the man had some demons, demons that he overcome many years ago . 
 And now does any amount of charity work, with the variety club being one of his favourites , along with many childrens charities benefiting from appearances by this once hero of British boxing.
 It would be nice to think such a great sportsman were not to be eternally overlooked by the country that he represented.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
